underlying_goal: Fix failing Playwright test locators for Hyva theme and resolve test configuration issues causing wrong tests to run
friction_detail: Claude initially tried to fix luma cart page with dynamic locator loading when the real issue was that luma/admin tests shouldn't run at all under Hyva config.
brief_summary: User reported multiple failing Hyva Playwright tests; Claude fixed locator selectors and resolved test discovery configuration issues causing wrong app tests to run, though needed user nudges to identify the root config problem.
